meta.title: About - Eye On Idea
meta.description: Learn about Eye On Idea, a Danish digital consultancy founded by Rune M. P. Pjetursson. We help B2B companies build professional digital presence across Europe.

hero.title: Building Digital Foundations That Last
hero.subtitle: Eye On Idea is a Danish digital consultancy helping B2B companies establish and grow a clear, professional digital presence.

story.title: From Idea to Reality
paragraphs: Eye On Idea was founded in 2024 with a simple belief: every business deserves a digital presence that truly represents who they are and what they do.
Too often, companies end up with websites built from templates that don't fit, overengineered solutions they can't maintain, or projects that drag on without clear direction.

We take a different approach. Every project starts with understanding your actual needs - not pushing predefined packages. We build digital foundations that make sense for where you are now and where you're heading.

founder.name: Rune M. P. Pjetursson
bio: With a background spanning software development, digital strategy, and client collaboration, Rune founded Eye On Idea to bridge the gap between technical capability and real business needs.
Having worked with companies of all sizes across Europe, he brings a practical, results-focused approach to every project. No unnecessary complexity - just solutions that work.

philosophy.title: Working Philosophy
philosophy.text: I believe in building lasting relationships, not just delivering projects. When you work with Eye On Idea, you get a partner who understands your business and is invested in your success.

items.title: Clarity Over Complexity
items.description: We believe the best solutions are the ones you can understand and maintain. No black boxes, no unnecessary technical debt.

items.title: Partnership, Not Transactions
items.description: We're not here to sell you a website and disappear. We build relationships and stay invested in your ongoing success.

items.title: Honest Communication
items.description: We'll tell you what you need to hear, not just what you want to hear. Clear expectations lead to better outcomes.

items.title: Quality Without Compromise
items.description: Every project gets our full attention and expertise. We don't cut corners to meet deadlines or budgets.

steps.title: Understand
steps.description: We start by listening. What does your business actually need? What are your goals? What constraints are we working with?

steps.title: Plan
steps.description: Together, we define a clear scope and approach. No surprises, no scope creep - just a shared understanding of what we're building.

steps.title: Build
steps.description: We develop your solution with regular check-ins and transparent progress updates. You're never left wondering what's happening.

steps.title: Support
steps.description: Launch is just the beginning. We offer ongoing support to help your digital presence grow and evolve with your business.

location.title: Based in Denmark, Serving Europe
location.description: Eye On Idea is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark. We work with clients across the Nordic region and the European Union, providing remote-first collaboration with the option for in-person meetings when needed.

cta.title: Let's Talk About Your Project
cta.description: Whether you have a clear vision or just a rough idea, we're here to help you figure out the best path forward.
